Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-ITEM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :TEXT_SET_OF_BOOK IS NULL THEN 
 LIST_VALUES;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-ITEM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :INV_ORG_DESC IS NULL THEN 
 LIST_VALUES;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-ITEM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PAY_ORG_DESC IS NULL THEN 
 LIST_VALUES;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-ITEM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 RGRP_COMPANY NUMBER;
BEGIN

 RGRP_COMPANY := POPULATE_GROUP_WITH_QUERY('RGRP_COMPANY','SELECT S.SEGMENT_ID,S.SEGMENT_VALUE, S.SEGMENT_VALUE_DESC COMPANY_NAME FROM WIZ_SEGMENT'||LPAD(GET_BALANCING_SEGMENT(:SOB_STRUCTURE_ID),2,'0')||' S WHERE S.STRUCTURE_ID = '||:SOB_STRUCTURE_ID);
 
 IF :BALANCING_SEGMENT_VAL IS NULL THEN
 LIST_VALUES;
 END IF;

END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-ITEM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :TEXT_PERIOD_DESC IS NULL THEN
 LIST_VALUES;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :TEXT_PERIOD_DESC IS NULL THEN
 :PERIOD_FROM_DATE := NULL;
 :PERIOD_TO_DATE := NULL;
 :TEXT_PERIOD_ID := NULL;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 pl_id ParamList; 
 pl_name VARCHAR2(10) := 'parmlist'; 
 al_button NUMBER;
BEGIN
 :GLOBAL.GNUM_LOGIN_PERIOD_ID := :TEXT_PERIOD_ID;
 :GLOBAL.GNUM_LOGIN_PERIOD_DESC := :TEXT_PERIOD_DESC;
 
 :GLOBAL.GDAT_LOGIN_FROM_DATE := :PERIOD_FROM_DATE;
 :GLOBAL.GDAT_LOGIN_TO_DATE := :PERIOD_TO_DATE;
 
 :GLOBAL.GNUM_LOGIN_BALANCING_SEG_ID := :BALANCING_SEGMENT_ID;
 :GLOBAL.GNUM_LOGIN_BALANCING_SEG_VAL := :BALANCING_SEGMENT_VAL;
 :GLOBAL.GNUM_LOGIN_BALANCING_SEG_DESC := :BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC;

 :GLOBAL.gnum_set_of_book_id := :PARAMETER.PARM_SOB;
 :GLOBAL.gnum_login_emp := :TEXT_USER_ID;
 :GLOBAL.gnum_inventory_org := :INV_ORG_ID;

 :GLOBAL.gnum_structure_id := :SOB_STRUCTURE_ID;

 :GLOBAL.gnum_pay_org_id := :PAY_ORG_ID;
 
 -- IF :PAY_ORG_ID IS NOT NULL THEN
 -- PCKG_UTILITY.SET_PAY_ORG(:PAY_ORG_ID);
 -- END IF;
 
 
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_SET_OF_BOOK',ENABLED) = 'TRUE' AND :TEXT_SET_OF_BOOK IS NULL THEN 
 GO_ITEM('TEXT_SET_OF_BOOK');
 ALERT_ERROR('You can not continue without Set of book !','Required Information');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;

 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('INV_ORG_DESC',ENABLED) = 'TRUE' AND :INV_ORG_DESC IS NULL THEN 
 GO_ITEM('INV_ORG_DESC');
 ALERT_ERROR('You can not continue without Inv Organization !','Required Information');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;

 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PAY_ORG_DESC',ENABLED) = 'TRUE' AND :PAY_ORG_DESC IS NULL THEN 
 GO_ITEM('PAY_ORG_DESC');
 ALERT_ERROR('You can not continue without Pay Organization !','Required Information');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;

 
 
 IF :parameter.parm_sob is not null then 
 pl_id := Get_Parameter_List(pl_name);
 IF ID_null(pl_id) THEN 
 pl_id := Create_Parameter_List(pl_name); 
 ELSE 
 Destroy_Parameter_List(pl_id);
 pl_id := Create_Parameter_List(pl_name);
 END IF; 
-- Add_Parameter(pl_id,'PARM_USER_ID',TEXT_PARAMETER,:GLOBAL.gnum_login_emp);
-- Add_Parameter(pl_id,'PARM_SET_OF_BOOK_ID',TEXT_PARAMETER,:parameter.parm_sob);
 
 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN
 :GLOBAL.gnum_application_id:=:parameter.PARM_APPLICATION_ID;
 Add_Parameter(pl_id,'PARM_WIZMENU_ID',TEXT_PARAMETER,:parameter.PARM_WIZMENU_ID);
 Add_Parameter(pl_id,'PARM_WIZMENU_CODE',TEXT_PARAMETER,:parameter.PARM_WIZMENU_CODE);
 Add_Parameter(pl_id,'PARM_WIZMENU_TITLE',TEXT_PARAMETER,:parameter.PARM_WIZMENU_TITLE);
 NEW_FORM('FORM_WIZMENU',TO_SAVEPOINT,NO_QUERY_ONLY,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,pl_id);
 ELSE
 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_APP = 'WIZGL' THEN
 :GLOBAL.gnum_application_id:=1;
 NEW_FORM('D:\erp_menu\FORM_WIZMENU_DB.FMX',TO_SAVEPOINT,NO_QUERY_ONLY,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,pl_id);
 
 ELSIF :PARAMETER.PARM_APP = 'WIZATT' THEN
 :GLOBAL.gnum_Application_id:=8;
 NEW_FORM('D:\erp_menu\FORM_WIZMENU_ATT.FMX',TO_SAVEPOINT,NO_QUERY_ONLY,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,pl_id);
 
 ELSIF :PARAMETER.PARM_APP = 'WIZACC' THEN
 :GLOBAL.gnum_Application_id:=13;
 NEW_FORM('D:\erp_menu\FORM_WIZMENU_AS.FMX',TO_SAVEPOINT,NO_QUERY_ONLY,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,pl_id);
 
 ELSIF :PARAMETER.PARM_APP = 'WIZFIN' THEN
 
 :GLOBAL.gnum_application_id:=99;
 Add_Parameter(pl_id,'PARM_SHOW_ACC_STRUC',TEXT_PARAMETER,:parameter.ACC_STRUC); 
 NEW_FORM('D:\erp_menu\FORM_WIZMENU_COMPOSITE.FMX',TO_SAVEPOINT,NO_QUERY_ONLY,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,pl_id);
 
 ELSIF :PARAMETER.PARM_APP = 'WIZINV' THEN
 :GLOBAL.gnum_application_id:=2;
 NEW_FORM('D:\erp_menu\FORM_WIZMENU_INV.FMX',TO_SAVEPOINT,NO_QUERY_ONLY,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,pl_id);
 
 ELSIF :PARAMETER.PARM_APP = 'WIZNEW' THEN
 :GLOBAL.gnum_application_id:=99;
 Add_Parameter(pl_id,'PARM_WIZMENU_ID',TEXT_PARAMETER,:parameter.PARM_WIZMENU_ID);
 NEW_FORM('D:\erp_menu\FORM_WIZMENU',TO_SAVEPOINT,NO_QUERY_ONLY,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,pl_id);
 -- OPEN_FORM('D:\erp_menu\FORM_WIZMENU',ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,pl_id);
 
 ELSIF :PARAMETER.PARM_APP = 'WIZAR' THEN
 :GLOBAL.gnum_application_id:=3;
 Add_Parameter(pl_id,'PARM_SHOW_ACC_STRUC',TEXT_PARAMETER,:parameter.ACC_STRUC); 
 NEW_FORM('D:\erp_menu\FORM_WIZMENU_AR.FMX',TO_SAVEPOINT,NO_QUERY_ONLY,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,pl_id);
 
 ELSIF :PARAMETER.PARM_APP = 'WIZBACKUP' THEN
-- :GLOBAL.gnum_application_id:=3;
 --Add_Parameter(pl_id,'PARM_SHOW_ACC_STRUC',TEXT_PARAMETER,:parameter.ACC_STRUC); 
 NEW_FORM('D:\PROJECTS\OTHERS\FORM_WIZ_BACKUP_RESTORE',TO_SAVEPOINT,NO_QUERY_ONLY,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,pl_id);
 
 END IF;
 END IF; 
 
 --OPEN_FORM('D:\erp_menu\FORM_WIZMENU_DB.FMX',ACTIVATE,NO_SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA);
 ELSE
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('ALRT_MENU_MESSAGE',TITLE ,'Access Denied');
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('ALRT_MENU_MESSAGE',ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT ,'You are not an authenticated user, Access Denied');
 al_button:=SHOW_ALERT('ALRT_MENU_MESSAGE');
 --message('You are not an authenticated user, Access Denied'); 
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PCKG_WIZ_APPLICATION_MT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE PCKG_WIZ_APPLICATION_MT
IS

 PROCEDURE PRO_TRGR_REFRESH;
 PROCEDURE PRO_WHEN_NEW_FORM_INSTANCE;
 PROCEDURE PRO_ON_ERROR;
 PROCEDURE PRO_PRE_TEXT_ITEM;
 PROCEDURE PRO_POST_TEXT_ITEM;
 --PROCEDURE PRO_WHEN_WINDOW_CLOSED;
 PROCEDURE PRO_KEY_EXEQRY;
 
END PCKG_WIZ_APPLICATION_MT;

ProgramUnit.Name: PCKG_WIZ_APPLICATION_MT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE BODY PCKG_WIZ_APPLICATION_MT 
IS
/******************************************************************************************/
/* TRGR_REFRESH TRIGGER */
/* CREATED ON 05-MAR-2K2 */
/******************************************************************************************/


 PROCEDURE PRO_TRGR_REFRESH
 IS 
 var_temp NUMBER(1);
 BEGIN 
 -- var_temp := POPULATE_GROUP('RGRP_APPLICATION_ID');
 
 null; 
 END PRO_TRGR_REFRESH;


/******************************************************************************************/
/* WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE TRIGGER */
/* CREATED ON 06-MAR-2K2 */
/*******************************************************************************************/
 
 PROCEDURE PRO_WHEN_NEW_FORM_INSTANCE
 IS
 var_temp VARCHAR2(10);
 filename VARCHAR2(256); 
 BEGIN 
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW,WINDOW_STATE,MAXIMIZE);
 
 FILENAME :=PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_LOV_IMG;
 READ_IMAGE_FILE(FILENAME, 'BMP', 'CBLK_CONTROL.IMAG_LOV_APPL_ID');

 --EXECUTE_QUERY;
 --LAST_RECORD;
 PCKG_FORMS.PRO_TEXTBOX_EN(0);
 PCKG_MENUS.PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_NORMAL_MODE);
 

 ---------------- POPULATING GROUP
 --var_temp := POPULATE_GROUP('RGRP_APPLICATION_ID');
 END PRO_WHEN_NEW_FORM_INSTANCE;

/******************************************************************************************/
/* ON-ERROR TRIGGER */
/* CREATED ON 06-MAR-2K2 */
/*******************************************************************************************/


 PROCEDURE PRO_ON_ERROR
 IS
 BEGIN
 IF ERROR_TYPE = 'FRM' AND ERROR_CODE = 40200 THEN
 MESSAGE(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_UPDATE_MSG);
 ELSIF ERROR_TYPE = 'FRM' AND ERROR_CODE = 40202 THEN
 NULL;
 ELSIF ERROR_TYPE = 'FRM' AND ERROR_CODE = 40401 THEN
 NULL;
 ELSIF ERROR_TYPE = 'FRM' AND ERROR_CODE = 41051 THEN
 NULL;
 ELSIF ERROR_TYPE = 'FRM' AND ERROR_CODE = 40212 THEN
 NULL;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE(ERROR_TYPE||'-'||ERROR_CODE||'-'||ERROR_TEXT);
 
 
 END IF ;
 END PRO_ON_ERROR;

/******************************************************************************************/
/* PRE_TEXT_ITEM TRIGGER */
/* CREATED ON 06-MAR-2K2 */
/*******************************************************************************************/

 PROCEDURE PRO_PRE_TEXT_ITEM
 IS
 BEGIN 
 COPY(GET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_ITEM,CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE),'PARAMETER.PARM_LAST_ITM_VATT');
 set_item_instance_property(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_ITEM'),CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VATT_TEXTBOX_FOCUSED');
 
 END PRO_PRE_TEXT_ITEM;
 
 
/******************************************************************************************/
/* POST_TEXT_ITEM TRIGGER */
/* CREATED ON 06-MAR-2K2 */
/*******************************************************************************************/

 PROCEDURE PRO_POST_TEXT_ITEM
 IS
 BEGIN
 
 set_item_instance_property(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_ITEM,CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,:PARAMETER.PARM_LAST_ITM_VATT);
 
 END PRO_POST_TEXT_ITEM;

/******************************************************************************************/
/* PROCEDURE PRO_KEY_EXEQRY
/* CREATED ON 06-MAR-2K2 */
/*******************************************************************************************/
PROCEDURE PRO_KEY_EXEQRY
 IS
 BEGIN
 IF NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE')= PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FIND_MODE THEN 
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 IF NAME_IN('SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD') = 'FALSE' AND NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD') > 1 THEN
 LAST_RECORD;
 END IF;
 IF NAME_IN('SYSTEM.MODE') = 'ENTER-QUERY' THEN
 MESSAGE(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_NO_DATA_FOUND_MSG);
 --:PARAMETER.PARM_MODE := PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FIND_MODE;
 COPY(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FIND_MODE,'PARAMETER.PARM_MODE');
 PCKG_MENUS.PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FIND_MODE);
 ELSE
 --:PARAMETER.PARM_MODE := PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FILTERED_MODE;
 
 set_item_property('IMAG_LOV_APPL_ID',visible,property_false);
 
 COPY(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FILTERED_MODE,'PARAMETER.PARM_MODE');
 --:PARAMETER.PARM_CNCL_TO_FLTER := 'TRUE';
 COPY('TRUE','PARAMETER.PARM_CNCL_TO_FLTER');
 PCKG_MENUS.PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FILTERED_MODE);
 PCKG_FORMS.PRO_TEXTBOX_EN(0); 
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END PRO_KEY_EXEQRY; 


END PCKG_WIZ_APPLICATION_MT;

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDATE_USERNAME_PASSWORD
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE VALIDATE_USERNAME_PASSWORD IS
BEGIN
DECLARE 
 lnum_name NUMBER;
 lnum_ret NUMBER;
 lnum_validated_yn NUMBER(1);
BEGIN 


IF :TEXT_PASSWORD IS NOT NULL AND :TEXT_USER_HID IS NOT NULL THEN 

 
 SELECT employee_id,USER_NAME INTO lnum_name , :TEXT_USER_HID
 FROM EMPLOYEE_MT 
 WHERE upper(USER_NAME) = ''||upper(:TEXT_USER)|| ''
 AND APPL_USER_YN = 1;
 
 
 PCKG_UTILITY.VL(:TEXT_USER_HID,:TEXT_PASSWORD,lnum_validated_yn );
 
 IF lnum_validated_yn = 0 THEN 
 RAISE NO_DATA_FOUND; 
 END IF;
 
 :GLOBAL.gnum_login_emp:=lnum_name;
 :TEXT_USER_ID := lnum_name;
 
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_SET_OF_BOOK',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_SET_OF_BOOK',navigable,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 
 :TEXT_SET_OF_BOOK := ''; 
 :parameter.parm_sob := ''; 
END IF; 

EXCEPTION WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 
 :LOGIN_ATTEMPTS := :LOGIN_ATTEMPTS + 1;
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_SET_OF_BOOK',ENABLED,PROPERTY_false);
/* 
 IF :LOGIN_ATTEMPTS >= 3 THEN
 IF SHOW_ALERT('ALRT_INVALID_PASSWORD_EXIT') = ALERT_BUTTON1 THEN
 --MESSAGE('Invalid Login Name or Password ');
 :TEXT_PASSWORD := NULL;
exit_form(NO_VALIDATE,NO_COMMIT);
 END IF; 
 ELSE
*/ 
 IF SHOW_ALERT('ALRT_INVALID_PASSWORD') = ALERT_BUTTON1 THEN
 --MESSAGE('Invalid Login Name or Password ');
 :TEXT_PASSWORD := NULL;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
-- END IF; 
 END IF;
 
END; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_EN_DIS_PERIOD
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_EN_DIS_PERIOD IS
 lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv number(10):=0;
 
 lnum_field_1_y number(3):=3;
 lnum_field_2_y number(3):=22;

 lnum_labl_1_y number(3):=5;
 lnum_labl_2_y number(3):=24;
 
 lnum_incerase_height_per_fld number(5):=17;
 
BEGIN
 
 IF :LOGIN_PREF_COMPANY_YN = 1 AND :LOGIN_PREF_PERIOD_YN = 1 THEN

 IF lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv = 0 THEN lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv := lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv + 8; END IF;
 
 lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv := lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv + (lnum_incerase_height_per_fld *2);
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('LABL_COMPANY',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('LABL_COMPANY',Y_POS,lnum_labl_1_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('IMAG_2',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('IMAG_2',Y_POS,lnum_labl_1_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC',Y_POS,lnum_field_1_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('LABL_PERIOD' ,VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('LABL_PERIOD' ,Y_POS,lnum_labl_2_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('IMAG_3',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('IMAG_3',Y_POS,lnum_labl_2_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_PERIOD_DESC' ,VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_PERIOD_DESC' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_PERIOD_DESC' ,NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_PERIOD_DESC' ,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_PERIOD_DESC' ,UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_PERIOD_DESC' ,Y_POS,lnum_field_2_y);
 
 ELSIF :LOGIN_PREF_COMPANY_YN = 1 AND :LOGIN_PREF_PERIOD_YN = 0 THEN

 IF lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv = 0 THEN lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv := lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv + 8; END IF;

 lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv := lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv + lnum_incerase_height_per_fld ;

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('LABL_COMPANY',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('LABL_COMPANY',Y_POS,lnum_labl_1_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('IMAG_2',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('IMAG_2',Y_POS,lnum_labl_1_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC',Y_POS,lnum_field_1_y);

 ELSIF :LOGIN_PREF_COMPANY_YN = 0 AND :LOGIN_PREF_PERIOD_YN = 1 THEN
 
 
 IF lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv = 0 THEN lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv := lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv + 8; END IF;

 lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv := lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv + lnum_incerase_height_per_fld ; 

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('LABL_PERIOD' ,VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('LABL_PERIOD' ,Y_POS,lnum_labl_1_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('IMAG_3',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('IMAG_3',Y_POS,lnum_labl_1_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_PERIOD_DESC' ,VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_PERIOD_DESC' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_PERIOD_DESC' ,NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_PERIOD_DESC' ,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_PERIOD_DESC' ,UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TEXT_PERIOD_DESC' ,Y_POS,lnum_field_1_y);
 END IF;

 -- INITIALIZE 
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('WIND_EMPLOYEE',HEIGHT,:PARAMETER.PARM_ORIGINAL_HEIGHT_OF_MAIN+NVL(:parameter.PARM_ADD_VALUE_IN_HEIGHT,0));
 SET_VIEW_PROPERTY('CANV_STACK_COMPANY',VIEWPORT_Y_POS,:PARAMETER.PARM_ORIGINAL_Y_OF_STCK+NVL(:parameter.PARM_ADD_VALUE_IN_HEIGHT,0));
 SET_VIEW_PROPERTY('CANV_STACK_PERIOD',HEIGHT,:PARAMETER.PARM_ORIGINAL_HEIGHT_OF_INSTCK);
 --------------
 
 IF :LOGIN_PREF_COMPANY_YN = 1 OR :LOGIN_PREF_PERIOD_YN = 1 THEN 
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('WIND_EMPLOYEE',HEIGHT,GET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('WIND_EMPLOYEE',HEIGHT)+lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv );
 SET_VIEW_PROPERTY ('CANV_STACK_COMPANY',VIEWPORT_Y_POS,GET_VIEW_PROPERTY('CANV_STACK_COMPANY',VIEWPORT_Y_POS)+lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv );
 SET_VIEW_PROPERTY ('CANV_STACK_PERIOD',HEIGHT,GET_VIEW_PROPERTY('CANV_STACK_PERIOD',HEIGHT)+lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv );
 END IF;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_EN_DIS_OTHERS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_EN_DIS_OTHERS IS
 lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv number(10):=0;
 
 lnum_field_1_y number(3):=3;
 lnum_labl_1_y number(3):=5;
 
 lnum_incerase_height_per_fld number(5):=17;
BEGIN
 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_ASK_INV_ORG_YN = 1 THEN 
 
 IF lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv = 0 THEN lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv := lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv + 8; END IF;
 
 lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv := lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv + lnum_incerase_height_per_fld;
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('LABL_INV_ORG',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('LABL_INV_ORG',Y_POS,lnum_labl_1_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('IMAG_0',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('IMAG_0',Y_POS,lnum_labl_1_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('INV_ORG_DESC',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('INV_ORG_DESC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('INV_ORG_DESC',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('INV_ORG_DESC',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('INV_ORG_DESC',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('INV_ORG_DESC',Y_POS,lnum_field_1_y);

 lnum_field_1_y := lnum_field_1_y + lnum_incerase_height_per_fld;
 lnum_labl_1_y := lnum_labl_1_y + lnum_incerase_height_per_fld;

 END IF;

 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_ASK_PAY_ORG_YN = 1 THEN 

 IF lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv = 0 THEN lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv := lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv + 8; END IF;

 lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv := lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv + lnum_incerase_height_per_fld;
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('LABL_PAY_ORG',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('LABL_PAY_ORG',Y_POS,lnum_labl_1_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('IMAG_4',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('IMAG_4',Y_POS,lnum_labl_1_y);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PAY_ORG_DESC',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PAY_ORG_DESC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PAY_ORG_DESC',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PAY_ORG_DESC',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PAY_ORG_DESC',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PAY_ORG_DESC',Y_POS,lnum_field_1_y);

 lnum_field_1_y := lnum_field_1_y + lnum_incerase_height_per_fld;
 lnum_labl_1_y := lnum_labl_1_y + lnum_incerase_height_per_fld;
 END IF;
 
 :parameter.PARM_ADD_VALUE_IN_HEIGHT := lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv ;
 
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('WIND_EMPLOYEE',HEIGHT,GET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('WIND_EMPLOYEE',HEIGHT)+lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv );
 SET_VIEW_PROPERTY ('CANV_STACK_COMPANY',VIEWPORT_Y_POS,GET_VIEW_PROPERTY('CANV_STACK_OTHERS',VIEWPORT_Y_POS)+lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv+2 );
 SET_VIEW_PROPERTY ('CANV_STACK_OTHERS',HEIGHT,GET_VIEW_PROPERTY('CANV_STACK_OTHERS',HEIGHT)+lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv );
 
 SET_VIEW_PROPERTY('CANV_STACK_PERIOD',VIEWPORT_Y_POS,GET_VIEW_PROPERTY('CANV_STACK_PERIOD',VIEWPORT_Y_POS)+lnum_inc_height_of_stk_canv);
/* 
 -- INITIALIZE 
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('WIND_EMPLOYEE',HEIGHT,:PARAMETER.PARM_ORIGINAL_HEIGHT_OF_MAIN);
 SET_VIEW_PROPERTY('CANV_STACK_COMPANY',VIEWPORT_Y_POS,:PARAMETER.PARM_ORIGINAL_Y_OF_STCK);
 SET_VIEW_PROPERTY('CANV_STACK_PERIOD',HEIGHT,:PARAMETER.PARM_ORIGINAL_HEIGHT_OF_INSTCK);
 --------------
*/ 
 
END;

RecordGroup.Name: RGRP_SET_OF_BOOK
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT g.SET_OF_BOOK_DESC, STRUCTURE_ID,
 ENABLE_LOGIN_PREF_PERIOD,
 ENABLE_LOGIN_PREF_company,
 g.SET_OF_BOOK_ID
FROM WIZ_GL_SET_OF_BOOKS g , security_set_of_book s
where g.set_of_book_id = s.set_of_book_id AND
 s.employee_id = :text_user_id

RecordGroup.Name: RGRP_COMPANY
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT S.SEGMENT_ID, S.SEGMENT_VALUE , S.SEGMENT_VALUE_DESC COMPANY_NAME
FROM WIZ_SEGMENT01 S
WHERE S.STRUCTURE_ID = 1

RecordGroup.Name: RGRP_PERIOD
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT PD.PERIOD_ID,PD.PERIOD_DESC,PD.FROM_DATE,PD.TO_DATE
FROM PERIOD_DETAILS PD,WIZ_GL_SET_OF_BOOKS SOB,FINANCIAL_YEAR_MT FY
WHERE PD.PERIOD_TYPE_ID = SOB.PERD_TYPE_ID AND
 PD.CALENDAR_ID = SOB.CALENDAR_ID AND
 PD.FIN_YEAR_ID = FY.FIN_YEAR_ID AND
 SOB.SET_OF_BOOK_ID = 1
ORDER BY FY.FIRST_YEAR ||PD.PERIOD_NO DESC

Trigger.Name: KEY-CREREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
:TEXT_SAVE:=0;
--PCKG_MT_MENU_TRGRS.PRO_KEY_CREREC;

 lvch_max_vrno number(5);

Trigger.Name: KEY-F5
Trigger.TriggerText:
:TEXT_SAVE:=1;
/*IF (:PARAMETER.PARM_MODE = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE AND :SYSTEM.RECORD_STATUS='INSERT')
AND(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD=1 AND :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD='TRUE') THEN
 MESSAGE('Can not cancel this record');
ELSE

 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_MODE = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FIND_MODE THEN
 set_item_property('IMAG_LOV_APPL_ID',visible,property_false);
 END IF;
 PCKG_MT_MENU_TRGRS.PRO_KEY_F5;
 
 
END IF;

IF :PARAMETER.PARM_MODE = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_NORMAL_MODE THEN
 :TEXT_SAVE:=1;
ELSE
 :TEXT_SAVE:=0;
END IF;

SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EDIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.DELETE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.ADD_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:PARAMETER.PARM_APP := UPPER(:PARAMETER.PARM_APP);
:PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_CODE := UPPER(:PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_CODE);

:PARAMETER.PARM_ORIGINAL_HEIGHT_OF_MAIN := GET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('WIND_EMPLOYEE',HEIGHT);
:PARAMETER.PARM_ORIGINAL_Y_OF_STCK := GET_VIEW_PROPERTY('CANV_STACK_COMPANY',VIEWPORT_Y_POS);
:PARAMETER.PARM_ORIGINAL_HEIGHT_OF_INSTCK := GET_VIEW_PROPERTY('CANV_STACK_PERIOD',HEIGHT);

DECLARE
 lvch_logon_str VARCHAR2(100);
 lvch_usr_name VARCHAR2(100);
 lvch_pswrd VARCHAR2(100);
 lnum_slash_sign NUMBER(2);
BEGIN

 lvch_logon_str := PCKG_LOGIN.GET_USER_NAME_PSWRD('HP-78_6cr-X9',:PARAMETER.PARM_CLIENT);
 LOGOUT; 
 lnum_slash_sign := INSTR(lvch_logon_str,'/');
 lvch_usr_name := SUBSTR(lvch_logon_str,1,lnum_slash_sign - 1);
 lvch_pswrd := SUBSTR(lvch_logon_str,lnum_slash_sign + 1);
 LOGON(lvch_usr_name,lvch_pswrd);
go_block('WIZ_LICENCED_TO');
 execute_query;

 GO_ITEM('TEXT_USER');
 
 
 


READ_IMAGE_FILE(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_LOV_IMG, 'BMP', 'CBLK_CONTROL.IMAG_1');

IF :PARAMETER.PARM_RECONNECT=1 THEN
SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW,WINDOW_STATE,MINIMIZE);
NULL;
END IF;

--PCKG_FORMs.PRO_CENTRALIZE_FORM;
SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EDIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.DELETE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.ADD_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.FIND_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.CANCEL_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.SAVE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.APPLY_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);

 :GLOBAL.GNUM_LOGIN_PERIOD_ID := :TEXT_PERIOD_ID;
 :GLOBAL.GNUM_LOGIN_PERIOD_DESC := :TEXT_PERIOD_DESC;
 
 :GLOBAL.GDAT_LOGIN_FROM_DATE := :PERIOD_FROM_DATE;
 :GLOBAL.GDAT_LOGIN_TO_DATE := :PERIOD_TO_DATE;
 
 :GLOBAL.GNUM_LOGIN_BALANCING_SEG_ID := :BALANCING_SEGMENT_ID;
 :GLOBAL.GNUM_LOGIN_BALANCING_SEG_VAL := :BALANCING_SEGMENT_VAL;
 :GLOBAL.GNUM_LOGIN_BALANCING_SEG_DESC := :BALANCING_SEGMENT_DESC;

 :GLOBAL.gnum_set_of_book_id := :PARAMETER.PARM_SOB;
 :GLOBAL.gnum_login_emp := :TEXT_USER_ID;
 :GLOBAL.gnum_inventory_org := :INV_ORG_ID;

 :GLOBAL.gnum_structure_id := :SOB_STRUCTURE_ID;
 :GLOBAL.gnum_application_id:=1;

 :GLOBAL.gnum_pay_org_id :=:PAY_ORG_ID;


 
 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN

 SELECT wizmenu_id, title, wizmenu_code, application_id,ask_inv_org_yn , ask_pay_org_yn
 INTO
 :PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_ID , :PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_TITLE,:PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_CODE,:PARAMETER.PARM_APPLICATION_ID,:PARAMETER.PARM_ASK_INV_ORG_YN,:PARAMETER.PARM_ASK_PAY_ORG_YN
 FROM wizmenu_mt M
 WHERE M.WIZMENU_CODE = :PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_CODE;
 ELSE
 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_APP IN ('WIZFIN','WIZINV','WIZAR','WIZAP','WIZCM') THEN
 :PARAMETER.PARM_ASK_INV_ORG_YN := 1;
 ELSE
 :PARAMETER.PARM_ASK_INV_ORG_YN := 0;
 END IF;
 END IF;

SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('WIND_EMPLOYEE',TITLE,'User Authentication '||:PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_TITLE); 
PRO_EN_DIS_OTHERS;
 
END;
